example: So, first one realizes through seeing all this that one must have physical order.

definition: The act of realizing; an act of figuring out or becoming aware.

example: Do not let this setback distract you.
example_meaning: Đừng để thất bại này làm con nản lòng.
definition: An obstacle, delay, or disadvantage.

definition: the ability to sustain something

example: Most precipitation areas occur near frontal zones.

example: I'm sorry, I don't think that that was a romantic thing.

example: She said Leonard had the transplant a year ago at this place.

example: Jackpot !
example_meaning: Hay rồi!

example: John, he is a highly decorated police officer.
example_meaning: John, anh ấy là sẽ quan cảnh sát huân chương cao quý.
definition: The act of adorning, embellishing, or honoring; ornamentation.

example: I must say I have a hard time picturing her enjoying loneliness .
example_meaning: Tôi phải nói là tôi khó có thể tưởng tượng cảnh cô ta tận hưởng sự cô đơn .
definition: (uncountable) An emotional state in which a person experiences a powerful feeling of emptiness and isolation.

example: He is known for aesthetic combination of lyric poetry with realism.
example_meaning: Ông nổi tiếng với rất nhiều tác phẩm thi ca trữ tình theo chủ nghĩa hiện thực.

meaning: soi mói, săm soi, xét nét, bới lông tìm vết

example: Put these couplets on the front door

example: There's so much more to be gained by staying out of the limelight, in the background.

definition: Providing gain; profitable.

example: What if the fever's the innocent bystander ?

definition: A person who, although present at some event, does not take part in it; an observer or spectator.

example: Carpetbagger .

example: No that's the subjunctive .
example_meaning: đó là câu cầu khiến .
definition: (grammar, of a verb) inflected to indicate that an act or state of being is possible, contingent or hypothetical, and not a fact. English examples includesobeit;I wouldn’t if Iwereyou;wereI a younger man, I would fight back;I asked that heleave.

example: A houseful of condiments and no food.

definition: Something used to enhance the flavor of food; salt or pepper for example.

example: You, on the other hand, are proving exceedingly stupid.
example_meaning: đang chứng minh mình ngu ngốc quá chừng .
definition: To a vastly great extent or degree.

example: Ten Kingdom Halls were rendered unfit for use, and more than 430 Witnesses were without homes.
example_meaning: Mười Phòng Nước Trời kể như không dùng được , và có hơn 430 Nhân-chứng không nhà không cửa.
definition: Not fit; not having the correct requirements.

example: An elaborate stone balustrade , three cubits high, divided the Court of the Gentiles from the inner courtyard.
example_meaning: Phần sân dành cho Dân Ngoại được ngăn với sân trong bởi một hàng rào đá chạm trổ công phu, cao ba cubit.
definition: (architecture) A row of balusters topped by a rail, serving as an open parapet, as along the edge of a balcony, terrace, bridge, staircase, or the eaves of a building.

example: As Rokossovsky himself bitterly put it: "In Russia, they say I'm a Pole, in Poland they call me Russian".
example_meaning: Bản thân Rokossovsky cũng từng công nhận khá chua chát rằng: "Ở Nga người ta nói tôi là người Ba Lan, còn ở Ba Lan mọi người lại gọi tôi là người Nga".
definition: In a bitter manner.

example: Many caves still serve as dwellings .
example_meaning: Nhiều hang động vẫn được dùng làm nhà ở .
definition: A habitation; a place or house in which a person lives; abode; domicile.

example: But the clergyman did not want to get involved.
example_meaning: Nhưng ông mục sư không muốn dính líu vào việc này.
definition: An ordained Christian minister.
